page.title: 20Entertainments.
page.content: BINGO,DISCOS,FETES,PLAYS,and DANCES.These are entertainments in West Lavington.Mac sells newspapers and comics such as{Buster, Lookin, {Beano,Wordsearch,Get Along Gang,The {Weekly News,The Sun,Daily Mail,Daily {Express,Gazette and Herald.}Young children prefer{Lookin.}Older children prefer{Smash Hits.}In West Lavington about 30 people hire videos down at the Mobil Garage.They have 122 videos to sell or hire.The videos are mostly VHS not BETA.The video which they hire most is{Police Academy.}The woman said that the funny and serious videos are hired equally.We think the entertainment is poor for children.If we had a record shop it would help.It's a good idea to build a BMX track and an adventure play ground.
